ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Filed Front Sight[h3] Please see page 190 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 201 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increases the difficulty of combat checks to hit targets at ranges beyond Short range by one.
Decreases the difficulty of checks to conceal the weapon by one.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Forearm Grip[h3] Please see page 190 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 201 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Decreases the additional difficulty of making Ranged (Heavy) checks with this weapon while engaged to an additional [DIFFICULTY] (rather than [DIFFICULTY][DIFFICULTY]).

ItemAttachment.Name: Marksman Barrel
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Marksman Barrel[h3] Please see page 190 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 202 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Mono-Molecular Edge[h3] Please see page 190 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 202 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 194 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Multi-Optic Sight[h3] Please see page 191 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 202 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Removes up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] on any checks to use this weapon due to smoke, darkness, or other environmental conditions that obstruct vision.

ItemAttachment.Name: Spread Barrel
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Spread Barrel[h3] Please see page 191 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 203 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Serrated Edge[h3] Please see page 191 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 203 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 194 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Shortened Barrel[h3] Please see page 191 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 203 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Reduces the difficulty of checks made to conceal this weapon by 1.

ItemAttachment.Name: Under-Barrel Grenade Launcher
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Under-Barrel Grenade Launcher[h3] Please see page 191 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 205 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Weapon can fire grenades using the grenade profile, Ranged (Heavy) skill, and has Medium range.

ItemAttachment.Name: Under-Barrel Flame Projector
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Under-Barrel Flame Projector[h3] Please see page 192 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 204 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds a flame projector to the weapon.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Telescopic Optical Sight[h3] Please see page 192 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 203 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 195 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Tripod Mount
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Tripod Mount[h3] Please see page 193 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 204 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 195 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Weapon Sling
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Weapon Sling[h3] Please see page 193 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 205 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 195 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Weapon Harness[h3] Please see page 193 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 205 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Weighted Head
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Weighted Head[h3] Please see page 193 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 205 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 195 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: SmartTranq
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]SmartTranq[h3] Please see page 40 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Upon hit, target must make [B]Average ([DIFFICULTY][DIFFICULTY]) Resilience check[b]. If fail, target takes 5 strain, plus 2 strain per [THREAT]. GM may use [DESPAIR] to make target check again next round at increased difficulty.

ItemAttachment.Name: Gene Lock
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Gene Lock[h3] See page 51 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Weapon functions only in the hands of its authorized user.
Self-Destruct. Inflicts one critical hit if unauthorized user tries to use locked weapon. Weapon is destroyed.

ItemAttachment.Name: "Bantha's Eye" Laser Sight
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]"Bantha's Eye" Laser Sight[h3] See page 52 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: H9 Pistol Grip
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]H9 Pistol Grip[h3] See page 52 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Add [SETBACK] to any combat check made when firing one-handed.

ItemAttachment.Name: "Final Word" Secondary Missile System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]"Final Word" Secondary Missile System[h3] See page 52 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Enables weapon to fire rockets, using missile's profile.

ItemAttachment.Name: Model 2 Wrist Mount
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Model 2 Wrist Mount[h3] See page 52 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Weapon can be worn on the wrist, freeing user's hands.

ItemAttachment.Name: Blaster Energy Dampener
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Blaster Energy Dampener[h3] See page 194 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increases the difficulty of checks made to detect this weapon's fire by one
Add 1 setback die to checks made to detect this weapon's fire

ItemAttachment.Name: Night Vision Scope
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Night Vision Scope[h3] See page 194 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Remove up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] on any checks to use this weapon due to darkness

ItemAttachment.Name: Shadowsheath
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Shadowsheath[h3] See page 194 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increases the difficulty of any checks made to detect the sheath or the weapon it holds by two

ItemAttachment.Name: Stun Pulse
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Stun Pulse[h3] See page 194 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Modular Backpack Accessory Pouch
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Modular Backpack Accessory Pouch[h3] Please see page 51 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Cortosis Weave
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Cortosis Weave[h3] Please see page 194 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 205 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Thermal Shielding System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Thermal Shielding System[h3] Please see page 194 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 207 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 201 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Reduces the difficulty of Resilience checks made to resist the effects of fire and extreme heat by one. Removes up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] added to checks due to extreme heat or fire.

ItemAttachment.Name: Heating System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Heating System[h3] Please see page 194 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 206 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 201 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Reduces the difficulty of Resilience checks made to resist the effects extreme cold by one. Removes up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] added to checks due to extreme cold.

ItemAttachment.Name: Enhanced Optics Suite
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Enhanced Optics Suite[h3] Please see page 194 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 206 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Removes up to [SETBACK][SETBACK] added to all Perception, Vigilance, and combat skill checks due to darkness, smoke, or other environmental effects that obscure vision.

ItemAttachment.Name: Strength Enhancing System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Strength Enhancing System[h3] Please see page 194 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 206 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Optical Camouflage System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Optical Camouflage System[h3] Please see page 195 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 206 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Upgrades the ability of all Stealth checks twice while wearing this armor.

ItemAttachment.Name: Superior Armor Customization
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Superior Armor Customization[h3] Please see page 195 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 206 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 201 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Vacuum Sealed
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Vacuum Sealed[h3] Please see page 195 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 207 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Allows the user to ignore the effects of vacuum or poisonous atmospheric environments for up to 10 minutes.

ItemAttachment.Name: SmartMed 2000 Integrated Med-Systems
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]SmartMed 2000 Integrated Med-Systems[h3] Please see page 53 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Once per session, may apply stimpack as incidental.
All Medicine checks made to heal wearer gain [BOOST].

ItemAttachment.Name: VX Hands-Free Weapon
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]VX Hands-Free Weapon[h3] Please see page 53 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Mounts single weapon on armor. User can aim and fire without using his hands. Use "Notes" feature to specify which weapon is mounted.

ItemAttachment.Name: Multi-Band Comlink
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Multi-Band Comlink[h3] Please see page 53 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: A long range comlink is integrated into helmet.

ItemAttachment.Name: OmniScan 3 Integrated Scanner
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]OmniScan 3 Integrated Scanner[h3] Please see page 54 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Built-in general purpose scanner
Adds [BOOST] to Perception checks to detect movement or hidden enemies.

ItemAttachment.Name: MB-7 "Ranger" Range Finder
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]MB-7 "Ranger" Range Finder[h3] Please see page 54 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: "Accu-Strike" Integrated Targeting Computer
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]"Accu-Strike" Integrated Targeting Computer[h3] Please see page 54 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Add [BOOST] to all Ranged attacks at long or extreme range.

ItemAttachment.Name: Barab Ingot
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Barab Ingot[h3] Please see page 136 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Dantari Crystal
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Dantari Crystal[h3] Please see page 196 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: When making a Force power check as part of a combat check, may spend [FORCEPOINT] to recover 2 strain.

ItemAttachment.Name: Dragite Gem
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Dragite Gem[h3] Please see page 196 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Krayt Dragon Pearl
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Krayt Dragon Pearl[h3] Please see page 199 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Lorrdian Gemstone
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Lorrdian Gemstone[h3] Please see page 199 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Mephite Crystal
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Mephite Crystal[h3] Please see page 200 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Force-sensitive characters using Force powers to sense their surroundings automatically detect a lightsaber using a mephite crystal if it is within the range of the power.

ItemAttachment.Name: Ilum Crystal
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Ilum Crystal[h3] Please see page 197 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Sapith Gem
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Sapith Gem[h3] Please see page 200 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Curved Hilt
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Curved Hilt[h3] Please see page 196 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds automatic [ADVANTAGE] to successful Lightsaber combat checks when engaged with a single opponent.

ItemAttachment.Name: Dual-Phase Modification
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Dual-Phase Modification[h3] Please see page 197 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: May change blade length once per encounter as an incidental. Next attack that turn ignores target's melee defense.

ItemAttachment.Name: Extended Hilt
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Extended Hilt[h3] Please see page 197 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Superior Hilt Personalization
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Superior Hilt Personalization[h3] Please see page 200 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Training Lightsaber Emitter
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Training Lightsaber Emitter[h3] Please see page 200 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Biofeedback System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Biofeedback System[h3] Please see page 200 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Energy Dispersion System
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Energy Dispersion System[h3] Please see page 201 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: When reducing strain damage by soak, count soak as two higher

ItemAttachment.Name: Helmet Comlink
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Helmet Comlink[h3] Please see page 140 of the Force and Destiny Beta Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: A long-range comlink is integrated into the helmet

ItemAttachment.Name: In-Helmet Scanner
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]In-Helmet Scanner[h3] Please see page 201 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds a general purpose scanner to the user’s helmet. The scanner allows the user to remove [SETBACK] imposed on any checks due to darkness or environmental conditions such as smoke or fog. It also allows the user to detect heat sources and motion within medium range.

ItemAttachment.Name: Advanced Targeting Array
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Advanced Targeting Array[h3] Please see page 269 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 286 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 269 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Enhanced Carbon-Durasteel Armor
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Enhanced Carbon-Durasteel Armor[h3] Please see page 269 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 286 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 269 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Electronic Countermeasures Suite
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Electronic Countermeasures Suite[h3] Please see page 269 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 286 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 269 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Blocks sensors within range, counting the ship's silhouette as one smaller when being fired upon.
Immediately notifies all ships in a star system or within 100 kilometers if planetside to the ship or vehicle's existence.
Increase difficulty by one with Guided quality

ItemAttachment.Name: Hydraulic Control Circuits
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Hydraulic Control Circuits[h3] Please see page 270 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 286 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 270 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Half damage from weapons with Ion quality
Defender chooses ship component affected

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Reinforced Shield Generator[h3] Please see page 270 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 287 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 270 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Smuggling Compartments[h3] Please see page 270 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, or page 271 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Hyperdrive Generator[h3] Please see page 271 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 286 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 270 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]High-Output Ion Turbine[h3] Please see page 271 of the Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook, page 286 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 269 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Upgraded Comms Array
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Upgraded Comms Array[h3] Please see page 287 of the Age of Rebellion Core Rulebook, or page 271 of the Force and Destiny Core Rulebook, for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Swoop Speed Modification
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Swoop Speed Modification[h3] Boosts the engines of a swoop and also removes excess weight from the chassis.

ItemAttachment.Name: Predictive Targeting Array
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Predictive Targeting Array[h3] Please see page 143 of the Suns of Fortune Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: When making auto-fire attack, do not increase difficulty by 1.

ItemAttachment.Name: Oversized External Weapons Mount
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Oversized External Weapons Mount[h3] Please see page 60 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: T9 Stinger Assault Boarding Tube
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]T9 Stinger Assault Boarding Tube[h3] Please see page 61 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: May cut a hole in a docked craft's hull or airlock.

ItemAttachment.Name: Fogger Smoke Generator
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Fogger Smoke Generator[h3] Please see page 61 of the Dangerous Covenants Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Provides concealment that adds [SETBACK][SETBACK][SETBACK].

ItemAttachment.Name: Augmented Buffer
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Augmented Buffer[h3] Please see page 47 of The Jewel of Yavin Adventure Module for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Repulsorlift Enhancement
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Repulsorlift Enhancement[h3] Please see page 47 of The Jewel of Yavin Adventure Module for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: As a maneuver, suffer 1 system strain to add +1 maximum speed for one round.

ItemAttachment.Name: Upgraded Firepower
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Upgraded Firepower[h3] Please see page 48 of The Jewel of Yavin Adventure Module for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Maneuvering Thrusters
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Maneuvering Thrusters[h3] Please see page 47 of The Jewel of Yavin Adventure Module for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Astromech Droid Socket
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Astromech Droid Socket[h3] Please see page 63 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Allows starship to link to an astromech droid via SCOMP
Automated droid ejection system

ItemAttachment.Name: Gravity Mine Launcher
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Gravity Mine Launcher[h3] Please see page 64 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Allows vehicle to deploy gravity mines within close range
Increase deployable range to short

ItemAttachment.Name: Hardened Circuits
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Hardened Circuits[h3] Please see page 64 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Hull/Keel Reinforcement
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Hull/Keel Reinforcement[h3] Please see page 64 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Physical Countermeasures
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Physical Countermeasures[h3] Please see page 64 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds [SETBACK] to all Gunnery checks made using misiles, rockets, or torpedoes targeting the starship.
Adds [SETBACK] to all Gunnery checks made using misiles, rockets, or torpedoes targeting the starship.
Increase difficulty by 1 when making checks triggered by the Guided quality.

ItemAttachment.Name: Ram Attachment
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Ram Attachment[h3] Please see page 65 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Treats the starship or vehicle's defense as 2 higher when instigating a collision.
Add 1 more defense when instigating a collision.

ItemAttachment.Name: Slave Circuit
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Slave Circuit[h3] Please see page 65 of the Stay on Target Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Allows a ship or vehicle to be activated or deactivated by remote control.
Allows ship or vehicle to move to the owner's location using owner's Piloting skill.
Allows ship or vehicle to autonomously use its weapon systems using owner's appropriate skill.

ItemAttachment.Name: Poison Reservoir
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Poison Reservoir[h3] Please see page 105 of the Lords of Nal Hutta Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Allows user to store one dose of neurotoxin, anesthetic, neuroparalytic, or similar toxins.

ItemAttachment.Name: Blaster Suppressor
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Blaster Suppressor[h3] Please see page 106 of the Lords of Nal Hutta Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds [SETBACK][SETBACK] to Perception or Vigilance checks made to locate a concealed shooter firing silenced blaster.

ItemAttachment.Name: Threat Monitor
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Threat Monitor[h3] Please see page 106 of the Lords of Nal Hutta Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Astrogation Droid Brain
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Astrogation Droid Brain[h3] Please see page 62 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds a Droid Brain with Astrogation Skill 2 and Intellect 0
Increase Droid Brain's Astrogation Skill by 1

ItemAttachment.Name: Autopilot Droid Brain
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Autopilot Droid Brain[h3] Please see page 62 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds a Droid Brain with Piloting Skills 2 and Intellect 0
May summon vehicle via a beacon call.
Increase Droid Brain's Piloting Skills by 1

ItemAttachment.Name: AX-108 "Ground Buzzer" Surface-Defense Blaster Cannon
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]AX-108 "Ground Buzzer" Surface-Defense Blaster Cannon[h3] Please see page 62 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds one AX-108 Surface Defense Blaster Cannon weapon
Can fire automatically with a Ranged (Heavy) skill of 2 and an Agility of 0
Increase the weapon's automated Ranged (Heavy) skill by one

ItemAttachment.Name: Cloaked Smuggling Compartments
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Cloaked Smuggling Compartments[h3] Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook, for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increases difficulty of checks made to find compartment by 3.

ItemAttachment.Name: Set Trigger
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Set Trigger[h3] Please see page 51 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Automatic [SU][TH] to the first combat check made with this weapon each encounter.
Adds [SU] to the first combat check made with this weapon each encounter

ItemAttachment.Name: Overcharge Valve
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Overcharge Valve[h3] Please see page 51 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: As incidental, weapon gains Prepare 1 quality and +4 damage for next attack. After firing, weapon runs out of ammo.

ItemAttachment.Name: Paired Weapons
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Paired Weapons[h3] Please see page 51 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Reduce [AD] required to hit with second weapon when two-weapon fighting by 1.

ItemAttachment.Name: Underslung Scattergun
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Underslung Scattergun[h3] Please see page 51 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Adds a scattergun to the weapon.

ItemAttachment.Name: Starhawk Sidecar
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Starhawk Sidecar[h3] Please see page 53 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

ItemAttachment.Name: Interior Broadcast Suite
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Interior Broadcast Suite[h3] Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increases the strain threshold of each crewmember by 1

ItemAttachment.Name: Nightshadow Coating
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Nightshadow Coating[h3] Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Reduces range of enemy ship's passive sensors by 1 (minimum of close range) for detecting a vessel with nightshadow coating.
Reduce the ship's silhouette by 1 in combat

ItemAttachment.Name: Onboard Amenities Unit
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Onboard Amenities Unit[h3] Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Upgrades ability of Charm, Deception, and Negotiation checks while aboard once.

ItemAttachment.Name: Rapid Cargo Evacuation Chute
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Rapid Cargo Evacuation Chute[h3] Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Make an [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Mechanics check[b] as an action while in the cockpit or cargo bay to eject everything currently stored in the cargo hold.
May instead be activated as an action without making a check Mod.

ItemAttachment.Name: Whisperthrust Engine
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Whisperthrust Engine[h3] Please see page 63 of the Fly Casual Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Increases the difficulty of checks to detect this vessel by two while it is traveling at speed 3 or lower.

ItemAttachment.Name: Advanced Subspace Encryption Array
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Advanced Subspace Encryption Array[h3] Please see page 65 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Only the intended recipient can detect a transmission sent with this attachment without a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b].
Upgrade the difficulty of any checks to intercept or decipher transmissions made from this attachment once.
Add setback to enemy detection check
Add setback to enemy interception or deciphering check

ItemAttachment.Name: Luxury Passenger Compartments
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Luxury Passenger Compartments[h3] Please see page 65 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Add [BO] to all Charm, Deception, and Negotiation checks made against passengers within the vehicle. Checks made against passengers who are accustomed to opulence and luxury have up to [SE][SE] removed instead.

ItemAttachment.Name: Holonet Pirate Array
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Holonet Pirate Array[h3] Please see page 65 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Transmissions sent with this attachment can reach any facility that has access to interstellar communications. Transmissions can be intercepted with a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Computers check[b], provided someone is aware of the transmission.
Add setback to enemy checks to intercept outgoing transmissions.
Add boost to intercept HoloNet traffic

ItemAttachment.Name: Environmental Simulators
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Environmental Simulators[h3] Please see page 64 of the Desperate Allies Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Can replicate up to three different planetary environments, one at a time. When making Charm or Negotiation checks against members of species native to replicated environment, add an automatic [AD][AD] to pool.
Additional planetary environment

ItemAttachment.Name: Engineering Access
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]Engineering Access[h3] Please see page 61 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Anyone working on internal systems, such as power systems, hyperdrive, computers, sensors, gain [BOOST] to Mechanics and Computer checks due to the ease of reaching such typically hidden systems.

ItemAttachment.Name: ANQ 3.6 Tracking Computer
ItemAttachment.Description: [H3]ANQ 3.6 Tracking Computer[h3] Please see page 60 of the Enter the Unknown Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: Choose one target and make [B]Average ([DI][DI]) Computers check[b]. If successful, combat checks against target are upgraded once. [SU][SU][SU] or [TR] allows additional target.
